amendment.description: To redirect funds to the Susquehanna Greenway, Maryland.

vote.text: Amendment SA 48 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 48 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Sarbanes. (consideration: CR S1412; text: CR S1412) To redirect funds to the Susquehanna Greenway, Maryland.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 48 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 48 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Sarbanes.
